Key.Original: You will receive your next paycheck in %1 minutes
Key.English: You will receive your next paycheck in %1 minutes
Key.German: Du erhältst deinen nächsten Lohn in %1 Minuten
Key.Dutch: Du erhältst deinen nächsten Lohn in %1 Minuten

Key.Original: You have missed a paycheck because you were dead.
Key.English: You have missed a paycheck because you were dead.
Key.German: Du erhältst kein Lohn da du gestorben bist.
Key.Dutch: Du erhältst kein Lohn da du gestorben bist.

Key.Original: You have received a paycheck of %1 Coins
Key.English: You have received a paycheck of %1Coins
Key.German: Du hast Dein Lohn in Höhe von %1 Coins erhalten
Key.Dutch: Du hast Dein Lohn in Höhe von %1 Coins erhalten
